column4: hello this is sort of a very unprobable thing to ask but is there a way to dual boot both windows and ubuntu at the same time using 2 monitors? with out using a virtual machine
i have both win 7 and ubuntu installed already

ok dang now i dont know to much about virtual machines but i have a windows 7 key on the back of my computer can i use that key if i ran win 7 virtualy from ubuntu ? or will i have to buy a whole new key ?
